column5: Well after fishing 12 of the last 16 days i had to come home and get back to working!  wow it is sooooooooo hard to get motivated knowing the work projects i have in front of me for the next month.  And not much if any fishing will be done in that time as well.  mmmmm daydreaming of catching these guys on nipissing this morning!         Break time is over back to work now!!!!!!!!!  Cheers!
12 days!  That's 6 weekends of fishing....a summer's worth for many, I'm sure.  That would make it really hard to get back to work.  I love the markings on the bass in the first pic!
12 days in a row??That should hold you over for awhile!! Those are some nice Nipissing smallies!!
Looks like they been feeding well. Fat fish. TFS

yes actually it was 13 of the last 15 but im done for while it looks like.  I dont think i will be fishing until the end of august unfortunatly.  Oh well it was a great couple weeks thats for sure.  Im planning a trip with a friend in september so hopefully that pulls through!  Cheers!
wow, great markings on that first smallie!  good work!
Glad you injoyed your time fishing, thanks for the report...

I think many of us are envious that you got that many days to fish in such a short period of time!  I've thoroughly enjoyed your reports over that time period....thanks for taking the time to post them!  Great smallie by the way.
Wicked colors on the first fish!!!  RF
The first smallie is quite a specimen! Looks like a great time, now get back to work
